about_the_game:
2.5D ROGUELITE SHOOTER WITH UNIQUE GAMEPLAY AND A KILLER SOUNDTRACK

Easy to play yet difficult to master, Enemy Metal features unique starships and vibrant planets. Destroy enemies to unlock new starships and planets and gather crystals to power up your starships.

Battle for Survival

Begin your campaign on Planet Aureus and fight to survive with unlimited time. Compete against players around the world with a global leaderboard on each planet.

Battle against Time

Progress and discover new game modes on Ignis, the Planet of Fire and Glaceus, the Planet of Ice with limited time and increased damage. Battle the mysterious enemy in a race against time in the final challenge on Arcana, the dark moon.

Power Up

Reach high levels on each planet to permanently upgrade your starships and unlock exciting new planets and starships as you defend the Sunstar System. Gather crystals to restore health and energy and increase your speed, firepower and shields.

Achieve Greatness

Complete achievements on each planet to earn permanent boosts for all your starships.
